title: Large FPS drop since Patch 4.20
body:
Hello,

I bought a new lenovo laptop a few months back.
Windows 8
Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4510 CPU @ 2.00GHZ quad core
NVIDIA GeForce GT 730M

Before patch 4.20 I ran the game flawlessly at 60fps which is where I had it capped. It didn't even blink an eye during teamfights.
But since 4.20, I'm lucky to get 40FPS with low settings, and the frame rates constantly fluctuate. 
I can run many other demanding games at high framerate with no problem. 
This game has been fucked for me permanently I fear. 

I checked the stupid FPS post and did almost all of it, and of course no change, which doesn't surprise me. None of these issues occurred until 4.20.

This combined with constant packet loss, champions skipping all over the place, makes the game pretty much unplayable on a 3 month old machine with dedicated graphics.

My fucking integrated card can run the game better.

replies.body:
Multiple people have been complaining about this problem. Some people playing on very strong computers are able to maintain a reasonable FPS, and some with very strong computers are hit extremely hard, but overall the FPS has dropped and hit many very hard since patch 4.21.

http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/2j7yn4/anyone_else_having_huge_fps_drops_this_patch

http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/2p62tj/fps_drops_421/

Its frustrating because Riot doesn't seem to be acknowledging it. Everything RIOT just shoots you to that stupid FPS fix page, but its pretty obvious at this point that nothing on that page will help.
Do you know if 100% Base Manaregen is stackable? Can I have 2 items with this "stat" and get 200%?
